channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla’s stock should be bought now, says analyst. This is who should be buying it and why.
item.description: Tesla shares have lost more than half their value in a span of just three months, and Cantor Fitzgerald now believes there’s 80% upside.

item.title: Discount retailer Ollie’s adds Big Lots stores, as a luxury-goods seller retreats from malls
item.description: Retailers have responded to a long period of inflation with a renewed emphasis on value over less-essential products, such as diamond rings.

item.title: General Mills sees slump in snack sales as customers focus on essentials
item.description: The company said that organic net sales “finished below our expectations.”

item.title: Why this strategist still says U.S. stocks should trade at a premium to China’s
item.description: Viktor Shvets, the global strategist at Macquarie, asks the very fair question of whether the still enormous gap in valuation between the S&P 500 (at ...

item.title: Treasury yields steady ahead of Fed decision
item.description: Yields on U.S. government debt moved slightly higher Wednesday morning as traders awaited a monetary policy update from the Federal Reserve.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
